critique: This document is an executive order transferring a Coast Guard ship to the Navy during a national emergency. It was issued in 1941. Given the context of World War II, several axes can be determined. Ideological Tilt is neutral as it is a wartime measure. Immigration is not relevant. Executive Power is slightly expanded as it is a transfer of assets during a declared emergency. Federalism is neutral. National Security is prioritized over civil liberties due to the wartime context. Economic Regulation is not relevant. Social Inclusion is not relevant.
